bibl.title: On Government and Law in Roman Egypt. Collected Papers of Naphtali Lewis. Edited by Ann Ellis HANSON.
bibl.note: Reproduction de 49 articles (1937-1993), avec de brèves notes de l'éditeur. - Editor's Preface, pp. ix-x. - Naphtali Lewis: Bibliography, pp. xi-xiii [supplément à: Ralph KEEN, Naphtali Lewis: Bibliography, BASP 15 (1978) pp. 1-8]. - Indices, pp. 375-383 [Subjects; - Greek words; - Texts discussed].
bibl.seg: LEWIS Naphtali, On Government and Law in Roman Egypt. Collected Papers of Naphtali Lewis. Edited by Ann Ellis HANSON. (American Studies in Papyrology. 33.)
Atlanta, Georgia, Scholars Press, 1995, 8°, xiii-383 pp. ISBN 0-7885-0146-1. $49.95.

Reproduction de 49 articles (1937-1993), avec de brèves notes de l'éditeur. - Editor's Preface, pp. ix-x. - Naphtali Lewis: Bibliography, pp. xi-xiii [supplément à: Ralph KEEN, Naphtali Lewis: Bibliography, BASP 15 (1978) pp. 1-8]. - Indices, pp. 375-383 [Subjects; - Greek words; - Texts discussed].
C.R. par Alain Martin, ChrEg 71 (1996) No. 141, pp. 189-190. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 42 (1996) pp. 243-244.
